attributes.action: Allow Heterosexual White English Men To Have Some Rights Once More
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Be allowed to smoke in public if you want.
Be allowed to drive at any speed anywhere.
Be allowed to drive any 4x4 without any ridiculous overzelous taxation.
Be allowed to enjoy tax cuts in return for private funding of schooling and healthcare.
Be allowed to speak without fear of retribution on the sublect of 'Indiginous Religion'.
Be allowed to take flights for 'Fun'.
Be allowed be Heterosexual White Males once more

rejection.details: This petition covers several issues that overlap with existing petitions.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
